title: Research data quality: user-error, system-prompt, system-reminder
description: Analyze samples of user-error, system-prompt, system-reminder. For each type: extract samples, score relevance, recommend handling strategy.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Paper 1 (user-error): Extract 5+ samples of 'user-error' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 1 (user-error): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 2 (system-prompt): Extract 5+ samples of 'system-prompt' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 2 (system-prompt): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 3 (system-reminder): Extract 5+ samples of 'system-reminder' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 3 (system-reminder): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
